title: Hymn 1: Mutsvene, Mutsvene
lyrics:
1. Mutsvene, Mutsvene,
     Mwari weMasimba.
     Mangwana, mangwana toimba
     kwauri
     Mutsvene, Mutsvene wetsitsi, namasimba
     Mwari wengoni Mwari,
     Mutsvene


2. Mutsvene, Mutsvene!
     vanokurumbidza,
     Vanhu vako vose kunewe
     kudenga
     Ingirozi dzose pachigaro
     chako
     Dzinopfugama mberi kwauri.


3. Mutsvene, Mutsvene, vanhu
     verima
     Vanhu vakaipa havakuoni.
     Uri woga Mutsvene: hapasisina
     mumwe;
     Una masimba nezvirokazvo


4. Mutsvene,Mutsvene,Mwari
     wemasimba.
     Anokurumbidza abasa ako
     ose
     Mutsvene, Mutsvene, wetsitsi
     namasimba
     Mwari wengoni, Mwari Mutsvene.

title: Hymn 2: Mudaro
lyrics:
O Lord my God! When I in awesome wonder
Consider all the works Thy hand hath made,
I see the stars, I hear the rolling thunder,
Thy power throughout the universe displayed.
